title: Easy Access to I-75 and I-696, On-site resident storage included
map_address: 32000 Concord Drive near 13 MILE RD. AND JOHN R.
posting_body: Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.

BRAND NEW COMMUNITY CENTER featuring an expansive Social Gathering Room, fitness center with state-of-the art fitness equipment and flat screen televisions and a beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool.
At Lexington Village Apartments you'll find so much more than a place to call home.
It begins with a walk around our beautifully landscaped grounds.
The brick-faced buildings and lush green grassy areas are the perfect place to relax with your favorite four-legged friend.
In addition to being close to a dog park, Lexington Village Apartments is also one of the few communities with a pet friendly policy.

Within walking distance of the Oakland Mall and close to downtown Royal Oak, our residents are close to great shopping, dining options and entertainment, while still enjoying the serenity of our neighborhood.
Easy access to I-75 and I-696 allow neighbors an easy way to get anywhere within the city.
We encourage you to visit and see for yourself just how much Lexington Village Apartments has to offer, including our unique 24-hour service guarantee.
Call to set up a private tour today!
Lexington Village Apartments offers pet friendly apartments in Madison Heights and welcomes both cats and dogs.
You'll find beautiful green spaces where your dog can run and play.
In addition, your dog can run free and meet new friends at the nearby Red Oak Dog Park.
We are one of the few communities in the area to welcome your large dog!
We have a limit of 2 pets under 25 lbs each or one large pet without a weight limit.
We're confident your pet will love living at Lexington Village Apartments as much as our human neighbors do!
